roleset.name: not meeting the acceptable standard
roleset.note: UNSATISFACTORY-J NOTES: Added by Julia for clearearth-earthquakes.

example.name: alias-j
example.text: However , this so-called `` expanding Earth '' hypothesis was unsatisfactory because its supporters could offer no convincing geologic mechanism to produce such a huge , sudden expansion .
example.arg: because its supporters could offer no convincing geologic mechanism to produce such a huge , sudden expansion
